definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Unlike those of the West, Chinese loans are "no strings attached."
sentences.chinese: 不象西方国家，中国的贷款是“无附带条件”。

sentences.english: Any liquid could be solidified under the certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 任何液体在一定条件下均可固化。

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因为附有条件，这份遗产便失去了一半价值。

sentences.english: The paper studied 7 case Masked civet of dystocia in farm condition.
sentences.chinese: 本文对7例在养殖条件下难产的花面狸进行了研究。

sentences.english: He ascribed his failure to objective conditions.
sentences.chinese: 他把失败归咎于客观条件。

sentences.english: Above term only apply to dorsa above3,000 bales.
sentences.chinese: 以上条件，仅适用于三千捆以上的订单。

sentences.english: Lateef says conditions like these keep small farmers in poverty.
sentences.chinese: Lateef女士说，像这样的条件下保持贫穷小农。

sentences.english: Under the condition of artificial feeding, effect of using cement quadrel to collect eggs was good.
sentences.chinese: 在人工饲养条件下，利用水泥方砖采卵效果良好。

sentences.english: The antibodies have been altered to fluoresce under certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，这些抗体被变成能发出荧光。

sentences.english: This paper explored the determinants of the port collusion by constructing two game models.
sentences.chinese: 从博奕分析角度对港口合作条件进行了研究。

sentences.english: Orthogonality conditions of vibration mode functions for bars are derived.
sentences.chinese: 导出杆的主振型函数之正交性条件。

sentences.english: Our trade terms are the same as the stipulations in the S/C No. 101.
sentences.chinese: 其他交易条件与101号销售确认书中的规定相同。

sentences.english: We has carried out systematic studies to characterize the condition inside the shoes in terms of hygienics.
sentences.chinese: 我们在鞋内卫生方面完成了系统研究，并注明了条件。

sentences.english: The influence of reaction conditions on the degree of substitution of acetylated starche was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反应条件对产品取代度和结构的影响。

sentences.english: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类拟解析系统的中心条件与等时中心条件。

sentences.english: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类拟解析系统的中心条件与等时中心条件。

definition: in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
to request/to require/requirement/to stake a claim/to ask/to demand/CL:點|点[dian3]
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
